teams.name: ANU Philosophy
teams.description: People associated, in one way or another, with the philosophy program at the Australian National University. Visitors, sympathisers, interested .. anyone is welcome to join.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Newmarket Loves You!
teams.loan_because: It is fun, rewarding, and a great learning experience. The opportunity to work together with diverse people around the world is inspiring and uplifting for all of us, and it gives our children the chance to learn emotional intelligence and social, green capitalism where everyone wins.
teams.description: We are an eclectic family group that is spead out and enjoy giving to kiva as gifts to each other instead of another neck tie or car accessory that we don't need!

teams.name: Independent Video Game Developers
teams.description: We are indie game developers -- people who make freeware or shareware games that aren't funded by large publishers. Please join if you're an indie developer or even if you just like playing indie games.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner;_default_max=0.5&partner;_risk_rating_min=1&partner;_risk_rating_max=5&partner;_arrears_min=0&partner;_arrears_max=1.1

Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Team Pitman
teams.loan_because: We wish to help others achieve success and happiness.
teams.description: We are all family members who wish to bring happiness to others!

teams.name: Braintree/Venmo
teams.whereabouts: Chicago, New York and San Francisco

teams.name: All women helping women around the world
teams.loan_because: Because women around the wold deserves to get  independent .
teams.description: It´s my hope that women around the world want to join this team to help other women to get independent and see theire buisness grow.

teams.name: McGraw Hill Financial
teams.loan_because:
Corporate Responsibility is fundamental to MHFI. It guides who we are, how we conduct ourselves and how we interact with those around us.

Corporate Responsibility Essentials at MHFI encompass:

– Financial Essentials – we help to provide the fundamental financial knowledge that can build better lives, stronger communities and stable economies and financial markets. 

– Community Essentials – we help deploy and foster the resources and skills that lead to smarter, stronger, more inclusive communities. Our employees are integral partners in our dedication to this critical purpose. 

– Environmental Essentials – we offer innovative business services that promote sustainability while applying best practice to reduce the environmental footprint of our operations.
teams.description:
McGraw Hill Financial is a high-growth, high-margin benchmarks, content and analytics company serving the capital and commodity markets. MHFI believes a responsible business is one that delivers value for investors, customers, employees and communities; makes wise use of natural resources; and treats people fairly.

We are home to some of the most iconic brands in finance and business, including: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services, S&P; Capital IQ, S&P; Dow Jones Indices, Platts, J.D. Power, and McGraw Hill Construction. Our independent credit ratings, indices, analytics, price assessments and research provide clients with the essential intelligence to manage risk and identify opportunities to grow.

teams.name: Tieks by Gavrieli
teams.loan_because: To empower women all over the world.
teams.description: The Tieks Team is a socially conscious group of people dedicated to lending and empowering women entrepreneurs all over the world.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Waldorf International Community
teams.description:
Our team is made up of an eclectic mixture of the international Waldorf Community. We are Waldorf/Steiner Schools, Classrooms, Students, Alumni, Parents of Students, Teachers & Faculty Members, Anthroposophists, Philanthropists, Bio-dynamic Farmers, Artists, and Poets.
Please join us in lending a hand to the good people of this world.
